title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER/EVEREST (2017+) MAZDA BT50 (2015-18) – FUEL MANAGER COMPANION PRE-FILTER BRACKET-LESS KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS FORD RANGER/EVEREST (2017+) MAZDA BT50 (2015-18) – FUEL MANAGER COMPANION PRE-FILTER BRACKET-LESS KIT

Western Filters Ford Ranger/Everest (2017+) & Mazda BT50 (2015-2018) Fuel Manager Companion Pre-filter Bracket-less Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Fuel Manager Pre-Filter Bracket-less Kit will fit on Provent Dual Bracket Kits Prov-20B & Prov-23B

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre-Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality.

Kit Includes:

  • 1x Fuel Manager Fuel Filtration Unit – Made by Stanadyne in the USA (Filters down to 30 Microns!)
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & wing nuts
  • 1x 30cm x 10mm Quality Fuel hose
  • 3/8 Inch Straight Barb fittings
  • Blanking Plugs
  • Hose Clamps
  • 2x 9.89mm (Black Quick Fittings)
  • Threadlocker Sealant
  • Detailed Instructions

Please Note: No Bracket Included

Check out the full range of products available for your Ford Ranger, Ford Everest or Mazda BT50!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
